item.title: test
item.description: this is a test now here is some sorce code: #include <bits/stdc++.h> using namespace std; int c[105] = {0}, w[105] = {0}; int f(int i, int v) { if (i == 0 || v == 0) return 0; if (v < c[i]) { return f(i - 1, v); } return max(f(i - 1, v), f(i - 1, v - c[i]) + w[i]); } int main() { int v, n; cin >> v >> n; for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i) { scanf("%d%d", &c[i], &w[i]); // NOLINT(cert-err34-c) } cout << f(n, v) << endl; return 0; }
